job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Are you ready to shape the future of AI at SparkOptimus and our clients? Are you passionate about developing cutting-edge (Gen) AI solutions for clients, building innovative tools, and growing a thriving AI service line? Do you want to work in a dynamic, entrepreneurial, and impact-driven environment? If this excites you, then SparkOptimus is the perfect place to embark on your next challenge!
       What you'll do
       As an AI Developer, you'll play a pivotal role in establishing and growing SparkOptimus' AI service line. This is a unique opportunity to apply your technical expertise to solve complex business problems, build impactful AI solutions, and directly influence the growth of our AI development capabilities. Your responsibilities will include:
          + Client MVP Development : Design, develop, and deploy AI solutions to help clients across industries accelerate their growth using (Gen) AI
          + Internal Tooling : Develop and enhance internal AI tools to empower our consultants and staff with cutting-edge generative AI capabilities, streamlining processes and enhancing productivity
          + Innovation and Thought Leadership : Stay at the forefront of technical (Gen) AI advancements, tracking the latest innovations and emerging trends to shape our AI offerings and serve as a trusted thought leader for clients, guiding them in leveraging cutting-edge tech for transformative impact
          + Collaboration and Strategy : Work closely with consultants, partners, and clients to integrate AI solutions into client strategies and SparkOptimus' internal workflows
       SparkOptimus is committed to fostering your development through personalized coaching, structured learning opportunities, and hands-on experience. This role offers an unparalleled chance to grow alongside a high-performing team and contribute to impactful AI projects.
       Why SparkOptimus?
       SparkOptimus helps organizations unlock the power of disruption. We spark and scale transformational initiatives that improve the lives of consumers and customers using new technology. We are pragmatic, we think like a start-up, and we focus on delivering customer and business value all over the world for organizations like Heineken, Ikea, eBay, Unilever, ING, CarNext and AkzoNobel. Our expertise lies in digital, sustainability, and (Gen) AI, and across these topics we provide tailored strategic consultancy that bridges the gap between vision and execution, ensuring our clients not only conceptualize innovative strategies but also implement them effectively.
       At SparkOptimus, we believe diversity and inclusion are inseparably linked to corporate social responsibility. SparkOptimus provides equal opportunities and treatment for all employees, and strives to make sure every employee feels recognized and at home with us.
       Why you should join us
          + Endless growth, learning and development opportunities within an internationally operating company with purpose
          + The opportunity to share your ideas and put your experience and knowledge into practice
          + Very positive work environment in a young, dynamic, and informal team
          + Supportive and friendly team to help you develop in the role
          + Fuel up with daily delicious and healthy breakfast, lunch and snacks
          + Office in the center of Amsterdam
          + Regular company events and team activities throughout the year
job_details.full_text:
AI Developer

Are you ready to shape the future of AI at SparkOptimus and our clients? Are you passionate about developing cutting-edge (Gen) AI solutions for clients, building innovative tools, and growing a thriving AI service line? Do you want to work in a dynamic, entrepreneurial, and impact-driven environment? If this excites you, then SparkOptimus is the perfect place to embark on your next challenge!
       What you'll do
       As an AI Developer, you'll play a pivotal role in establishing and growing SparkOptimus' AI service line. This is a unique opportunity to apply your technical expertise to solve complex business problems, build impactful AI solutions, and directly influence the growth of our AI development capabilities. Your responsibilities will include:
          + Client MVP Development : Design, develop, and deploy AI solutions to help clients across industries accelerate their growth using (Gen) AI
          + Internal Tooling : Develop and enhance internal AI tools to empower our consultants and staff with cutting-edge generative AI capabilities, streamlining processes and enhancing productivity
          + Innovation and Thought Leadership : Stay at the forefront of technical (Gen) AI advancements, tracking the latest innovations and emerging trends to shape our AI offerings and serve as a trusted thought leader for clients, guiding them in leveraging cutting-edge tech for transformative impact
          + Collaboration and Strategy : Work closely with consultants, partners, and clients to integrate AI solutions into client strategies and SparkOptimus' internal workflows
       SparkOptimus is committed to fostering your development through personalized coaching, structured learning opportunities, and hands-on experience. This role offers an unparalleled chance to grow alongside a high-performing team and contribute to impactful AI projects.
       Why SparkOptimus?
       SparkOptimus helps organizations unlock the power of disruption. We spark and scale transformational initiatives that improve the lives of consumers and customers using new technology. We are pragmatic, we think like a start-up, and we focus on delivering customer and business value all over the world for organizations like Heineken, Ikea, eBay, Unilever, ING, CarNext and AkzoNobel. Our expertise lies in digital, sustainability, and (Gen) AI, and across these topics we provide tailored strategic consultancy that bridges the gap between vision and execution, ensuring our clients not only conceptualize innovative strategies but also implement them effectively.
       At SparkOptimus, we believe diversity and inclusion are inseparably linked to corporate social responsibility. SparkOptimus provides equal opportunities and treatment for all employees, and strives to make sure every employee feels recognized and at home with us.
       Why you should join us
          + Endless growth, learning and development opportunities within an internationally operating company with purpose
          + The opportunity to share your ideas and put your experience and knowledge into practice
          + Very positive work environment in a young, dynamic, and informal team
          + Supportive and friendly team to help you develop in the role
          + Fuel up with daily delicious and healthy breakfast, lunch and snacks
          + Office in the center of Amsterdam
          + Regular company events and team activities throughout the year

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the development, fine-tuning, and deployment of generative AI solutions for clients and internal tools. It highlights core responsibilities like client MVP development using (Gen) AI, developing internal AI tools with generative AI capabilities, and staying at the forefront of (Gen) AI advancements. The mention of building 'impactful AI solutions' and 'cutting-edge generative AI capabilities' aligns directly with the definition and core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer, particularly in building user-facing or client-facing applications and tools powered by generative models.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Design, develop, and deploy AI solutions to help clients across industries accelerate their growth using (Gen) AI' directly refers to the process of building and deploying software applications that incorporate AI.
job_tasks.phrase: Client MVP Development : Design, develop, and deploy AI solutions to help clients across industries accelerate their growth using (Gen) AI

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Develop and enhance internal AI tools to empower our consultants and staff with cutting-edge generative AI capabilities, streamlining processes and enhancing productivity' describes the creation and improvement of software tools.
job_tasks.phrase: Internal Tooling : Develop and enhance internal AI tools to empower our consultants and staff with cutting-edge generative AI capabilities, streamlining processes and enhancing productivity

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Stay at the forefront of technical (Gen) AI advancements, tracking the latest innovations and emerging trends' implies working with and understanding advanced AI models, including generative ones.
job_tasks.phrase: Innovation and Thought Leadership : Stay at the forefront of technical (Gen) AI advancements, tracking the latest innovations and emerging trends

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Work closely with consultants, partners, and clients to integrate AI solutions into client strategies and SparkOptimus' internal workflows' indicates a need to understand business contexts and align AI solutions with strategic goals.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaboration and Strategy : Work closely with consultants, partners, and clients to integrate AI solutions into client strategies and SparkOptimus' internal workflows

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'apply your technical expertise to solve complex business problems' directly relates to understanding business challenges and applying technical solutions.
job_tasks.phrase: apply your technical expertise to solve complex business problems

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'shape our AI offerings and serve as a trusted thought leader for clients, guiding them in leveraging cutting-edge tech for transformative impact' implies understanding client needs and business strategy to guide them.
job_tasks.phrase: shape our AI offerings and serve as a trusted thought leader for clients, guiding them in leveraging cutting-edge tech for transformative impact
